blurb: Delivered Digital Twin of key decision processes to enable strategic planning with the power of what-if.
Partnered to deliver a scalable resilient primary web site leveraging public cloud for the first time.
Built machine learning powered MVP, launched product to market and secured successful Series A funding.
Led architecture, engineering, and organizational change for company migration to public cloud.
Delivered IoT data pipeline ingesting two billion datapoints per day to the cloud for analytics and data science.
Development of voice and chat bots integrating with enterprise platforms.
Enabled a rapidly-growing company with an analytics platform that adapts and scales with them.
Transformed data pipelines behind one of the country's most important websites with a novel, cloud-native approach.
Empowered an emerging data science organization to build and integrate DS capabilities company-wide.
Comprehensive assessment of people, processes, and technology in software organization.
Innovation partner for global R&D delivering cloud, data engineering, and application development solutions.
Partnered to deliver a major University Provider Portal leveraging the public cloud for the first time.
Architected and delivered data pipelines as part of global cloud transformation.
